about_the_game:
About This Game

After years of studying and hard work have left you burnt out, you score a coveted job with a plant sorceress. In the wild woods of Bramblewood you find a new purpose and sense of belonging as you explore the forest.

Learn spells to grow exotic and rare plants while helping the locals save their small businesses.

Characters

There's the sorceress who got the duchy of Bramblewood for helping put the current king on the throne. She teaches you plant magic. She's often times gone for long periods of time and trusts you to make sure everything runs smoothly in her absence.

The baker often asks for your help getting ingredients. She's widely known for her blueberry muffins.

There's a whole host of other characters just waiting to meet you.

Features

  • Cast magic spells to grow exotic plants

  • Forage and Explore Many plants can be foraged for. Some are only available at night.  You can grow plants simply for their beauty if you wish.

  • Craft and create bridges, tree houses, flying machines, and so much more

  • Diverse Characters Befriend a naga or help out an elf. The wide range of character's come from all walks of life bakers, merchants, coffee shop owners, sorceresses.

  • You set the Pace Explore the valley, forage for ingredients, learn new skills, or befriend the locals.

    A new peaceful life is just a click away.

name: Bramblewood

Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: When life gives you lemons, go work for a sorceress. After years of studying magic and hard work have left you burnt out, you score a coveted job with a plant sorceress. In the wild woods of Bramblewood you find a new purpose and sense of belonging as you grow magical plants.
